1.content: Verify Supabase configuration and test database
1.details:
1. Check if all tables exist in Supabase ✅
2. Verify edge functions are deployed ✅
3. Test storage buckets configuration ✅
4. Verify RLS policies are active ✅
5. Create test account ✅

2.content: Deploy to Vercel from GitHub repository
2.details:
1. Connect GitHub repo to Vercel ✅
2. Configure environment variables (VITE_SUPABASE_URL, VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY) ✅
3. Deploy and test - READY TO DEPLOY
4. Verify appointments system functionality

3.content: Create admin user and test complete system
3.details:
1. Register admin account
2. Set admin role in database
3. Test appointments booking
4. Test admin management panel
5. Verify email notifications
